column5: Hey, working on another project for school and this project outlines the evolution and changes within the NHL from day 1 to now basically. Looking on various sites for a good video that i can show the class that shows great old time hockey as well as hockey in today's rinks. Would like to see differences in hockey equipment, maybe a nice goal or two something like that.  Currently browsing You Tube but no luck really, anybody want to help me find something, just post the like please.   Thanks, MTBF
the rest of the video's are in the related video's on the right
This is one made by a young kid but very informative.

How about this, A Canadian Icon gets his TV start thanks to this interview.   Or this is pretty Historic.  Listen to some of the names involved.  This may of been the first game ever where Russians actually tried a Canadian Tradition by fighting or at least trying to.
